user.name: root
user.ObjectGrants: SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE,CREATE,DROP,RELOAD,SHUTDOWN,PROCESS,FILE,REFERENCES,INDEX,ALTER,SHOW DATABASES,SUPER,CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES,LOCK TABLES,EXECUTE,REPLICATION SLAVE,REPLICATION CLIENT,CREATE VIEW,SHOW VIEW,CREATE ROUTINE,ALTER ROUTINE,CREATE USER,EVENT,TRIGGER,CREATE TABLESPACE,CREATE ROLE,DROP ROLE!

user.name: root
user.ObjectGrants: SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE,CREATE,DROP,RELOAD,SHUTDOWN,PROCESS,FILE,REFERENCES,INDEX,ALTER,SHOW DATABASES,SUPER,CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES,LOCK TABLES,EXECUTE,REPLICATION SLAVE,REPLICATION CLIENT,CREATE VIEW,SHOW VIEW,CREATE ROUTINE,ALTER ROUTINE,CREATE USER,EVENT,TRIGGER,CREATE TABLESPACE,CREATE ROLE,DROP ROLE!

table.name: live_course_account
table.Comment: 直播课程账号表（受保护信息）

table.name: order_detail
table.Comment: 订单明细 订单明细

table.name: menu
table.Comment: 订单明细 订单明细

column.name: business_type
column.Comment: 业务类型（0其它 1新增 2修改 3删除）

column.name: operator_type
column.Comment: 操作类别（0其它 1后台用户 2手机端用户）

column.name: ware_id
column.Comment: 仓库id（默认为：0为平台用户）

column.name: coupon_type
column.Comment: 购物券类型 1 注册卷 2：推荐赠送卷

column.name: publish_status
column.Comment: 发布状态[0-未发布，1-已发布]

column.name: coupon_status
column.Comment: 购物券状态（1：未使用 2：已使用）

column.name: zhubo_account
column.Comment: 主播账号（欢拓系统的主播id）

column.name: page_view_mode
column.Comment: 界面模式 1全屏模式 0二分屏 2课件模式

column.name: number_enable
column.Comment: 是否开启 观看人数 0否 1是

column.name: store_enable
column.Comment: 商城是否开启 0未开启 1开启

column.name: store_type
column.Comment: 1商品列表,2商城链接,3商城二维码

column.name: putaway
column.Comment: 商品状态：0下架，1上架，2推荐

column.name: pay
column.Comment: 购买模式(1,链接购买 2,二维码购买)

column.name: duration
column.Comment: 用户停留的时间(单位：秒)

column.name: session_id
column.Comment: 会话id 当前会话id 继承购物车中会话id

column.name: out_trade_no
column.Comment: 订单交易编号（第三方支付用)

column.name: trade_body
column.Comment: 订单描述(第三方支付用)

column.name: price
column.Comment: 课程销售价格，设置为0则可免费观看

column.name: status
column.Comment: 课程状态 0未发布 1已发布

column.name: career
column.Comment: 讲师资历,一句话说明讲师

column.name: level
column.Comment: 头衔 1高级讲师 2首席讲师

column.name: is_free
column.Comment: 是否可以试听：0收费 1免费

column.name: duration
column.Comment: 用户停留的时间(单位：秒)

column.name: url
column.Comment: 网页 链接，用户点击菜单可打开链接

column.name: meun_key
column.Comment: 菜单KEY值，用于消息接口推送
